text: Spyros Achilleos Kyprianou (or Cyprianou) (; 28 October 1932 â€“ 12 March 2002) was an Cypriot politician. He was one of the most important politicians of modern Cyprus. He served as the second President of the Republic of Cyprus from 1977 to 1988. Spyros Kyprianou died on 12 March 2002 after a long fight with prostate cancer. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Cyprus Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Presidents of Cyprus Category:Presidents of the House of Representatives (Cyprus)
title: Spyros Kyprianou
